snippet: Jacob “Jack” Lew, the current White House Chief of Staff, has experience working in both the White House and on Capitol Hill. Here are some of his recent statements on issues he is likely to confront if he is confirmed as secretary of the...
lead_paragraph: Jacob “Jack” Lew, the current White House Chief of Staff, has experience working in both the White House and on Capitol Hill. Here are some of his recent statements on issues he is likely to confront if he is confirmed as secretary of the treasury.
